trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with 15Five | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with 15Five | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use 15Five with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use 15Five with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with 15Five
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with 15Five

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528017).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=528017).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and 15Five.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and 15Five.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A 15Five single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A 15Five single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to 15Five will be able to single sign into the application at your 15Five company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to 15Five will be able to single sign into the application at your 15Five company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for 15Five
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for 15Five

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for 15Five
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for 15Five

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for 15Five.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for 15Five.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for 15Five, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for 15Five, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **15Five**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **15Five**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **15Five**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **15Five**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: 15Five
trans-unit.target: 15Five

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to 15Five with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to 15Five with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **15Five** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **15Five** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to 15Five** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to 15Five** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **15Five Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.15Five.com*", and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **15Five Sign In URL** textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "*https://company.15Five.com*", and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at 15Five** page, click **Download metadata**, and then forward the metadata file to the 15Five support team.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at 15Five** page, click **Download metadata**, and then forward the metadata file to the 15Five support team.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Single sign-on needs to be enabled by the 15Five support team.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Single sign-on needs to be enabled by the 15Five support team.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configure single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into 15Five, they must be provisioned into 15Five.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into 15Five, they must be provisioned into 15Five.

trans-unit.source: In the case of 15Five, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of 15Five, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure user provisioning, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Log in to your **15Five** company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your **15Five** company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to **Manage Company**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Manage Company**.

trans-unit.source: Manage Company
trans-unit.target: Manage Company

trans-unit.source: Go to **People \> Add People**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **People \> Add People**.

trans-unit.source: People
trans-unit.target: People

trans-unit.source: In the Add New Person section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Add New Person section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Add New Person
trans-unit.target: Add New Person

trans-unit.source: Type the **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Title**, **Email address** of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the **First Name**, **Last Name**, **Title**, **Email address** of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click **Done**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Done**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The Azure AD account holder will receive an email including a link to confirm the account before it becomes active.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The Azure AD account holder will receive an email including a link to confirm the account before it becomes active.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other 15Five user account creation tools or APIs provided by 15Five to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other 15Five user account creation tools or APIs provided by 15Five to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to 15Five, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to 15Five, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **15Five **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **15Five **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign users
trans-unit.target: Assign users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
